body:
Hi today I get banned only to say a server ip to a friend that doesn't have skype.
Can I get unbanned please.
This is my favourite server I will not do it again.

title: I got Banned

replies.body:
Email support@avicus.net 
Seems that you were caught advertising which is strictly against the rules.
